thread.title: BRIEF-Fortress Transportation And Infrastructure Investors Intends To Offer 7 Mln of Its Common Shares

title: BRIEF-Fortress Transportation And Infrastructure Investors Intends To Offer 7 Mln of Its Common Shares
text:
12 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Fortress Transportation And Infrastructure Investors Intends To Offer 7 Mln of Its Common Shares Reuters Staff 
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Fortress Transportation And Infrastructure Investors Llc: 
* FORTRESS TRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTORS LLC ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON SHARES 
* FORTRESS TRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTORS LLC - INTENDS TO OFFER 7 MILLION OF ITS COMMON SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
